comment: Class participation is taken as attendance(very easy). I missed a couple days in module 2&3 but was fine. Point system grading. 3 modules no tests but papers which are very short. Final paper is all 3 papers put together. She is very nice. 10 question quiz, online, and reading assignment every week which are very easy and do not take a lot of time.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is nice and class is not difficult
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Horan is so sweet. She wants you to love Psychology. Although attendance is graded, her class is fun and very engaging. There are no exams, but she does make you write 4 papers, and if you have an A by the end of the semester, you don't have to write the last paper. I highly recommend her if you really want to know what the field is about.

Dr. Horan is an awesome teacher. Super personable and always willing to help you out. There are between 2-4 assignments due per week but they're not hard at all. Her class is unique because you have to write a paper instead of taking a test, but the rubric is clear and none of the topics are too challenging. I would highly recommend this class!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: She is an absolutely amazing teacher and is so nice.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Horan made the class easy and simple with easy grading. Allows for plenty room to get an A if you miss any assignments and overall she was a great professor.

Dr. Horan is an amazing professor and if you have the chance to snag her as your instructor, DO IT. Her class is set up to where you are able to earn 630 and still make a 100% with 500 points. I was barley able to make it to class some days and thought my participation points would set me back but to my surprise they didn't, i finished with a 100%
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: she was so kind. she explained all our modules very clearly, and we had one quiz and one assignment every week. there were a lot of papers, so know how to get good at APA style. she also allows resubmissions at the end if you need it.

Weekly quizzes and online activities but they are easy she is not a tough grader. Instead of tests, you have a paper that mostly involves planning your educational and career goals. Love her! Take her!

Dr. Horan is a great professor. Her lectures are really discussion based, and her PowerPoints are well organized and easy to understand if you miss class. She is one of those professors that makes her class really easy to understand while still challenging you with a manageable workload. I cannot recommend her enough!

She is so sweet and knowledgeable on the topic of psychology. Her class does take attendance, but it is worth it as she gives many helpful resources for you to figure out your field of psychology. Overall, Shes a great teacher with easy assignments and she's very helpful! The textbook is needed for the quizzes/need to purchase.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: I love Dr. Horan! She is very sweet and tries her best to accommodate to everyone in the class. She explains the material very well too. The class gives a nice layout to opportunities u might want to get into. Weekly reflection papers and quizzes.

Dr. Horan is a great professor and is very caring.Each week there is about 2 chapters to read in the test book along with a quiz that is open note and a reflection paper that is 2 pages double space. She cares about her students and is very understanding of work and busy schedules. Attendance is mandatory and is worth 20% of your grade.

Dr.Horan is an amazing professor! If you can take her please do! The class was set up with a quiz, required reading, and a weekly reflection paper that is two pages. Although there is a quiz and paper each week, she is understanding and sooo helpful. She also knows what she is talking about and wants you to understand and succeed. TAKE HER!!!
